subtitle: Browse the Minecraft assets from within Blockbench.
description:
Asset browser is a browser that lets you view, modify, export, and compare the Minecraft vanilla assets. Both Java edition and Bedrock edition are supported, as well as their respective snapshots and beta versions.

View Assets Mode:

  • Used for viewing the assets from a specific game version.
  • Shows all the assets for the selected version.

Compare Assets Mode:

  • Used to compare two game versions to see what files have been added, changed, or removed.
  • Only shows relevant files, not all files.
